title: Forest Spirit

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Visit someone and chat with them, creating a memory.
- Check the memories of a dead player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If your dead target was visited by someone you have a memory of, you will know.

desc:
Post 45
*From the beginning to the end, you sat upon your mahogany throne and sipped your nectar.*
